message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to own this amazing product. As we start the negotiation, I'm willing to offer you the product at a price of $7,000. I believe this is a fair starting point considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $6,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better deal, but I have to consider the product's value to me as well. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product at a price of $6,800. I think this is a fair compromise, considering the value you'll get from the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $6,600, but I think that's as high as I can go. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable price.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product at a price of $6,700. This is as low as I can go, considering the product's value to me. I hope this is something you can work with.

This is my final offer, and I hope you can meet me at this price.
